item.description:
OK, it's that time of year! Let's play some outdoor volleyball in the park!

Note: This is not a recreational event.  There will be players with hard driven hits.

This will be an "intermediate and up" level meetup. It will be outdoors on a grass field playing 6's. Intermediate level means: Players with firm understanding of game strategy. Should have a good grasp of skills (passing, setting, hitting) and be able to move around to cover areas of the court. Play should consistently be bump-set-spike.

As always, please remember:

- Respect the RSVP system (Don't show up expecting to play without a confirmed RSVP)

- If it looks like you won't be able to make it or will run late please cancel your RSVP in time for someone else to join

- However, no-shows, latecomers and last minute cancellations detract from the event and will jeopardize your participation in further events so please plan wisely.
item.name: Outdoor Intermediate Level Volleyball at Greene Rose Heritage Park
